channel.title: CVE Feed for Podlove -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Podlove -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-25479|2024-08-02T11:25:18.511Z -- podlove -- podlove%20subscribe%20button
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Podlove Podlove Subscribe button plugin <= 1.3.7 versions.
